title: Drawing, "Gilbert Seldes Apartment: Design for the Lysistrata Lacquer Screen", ca. 1930
medium:
Brush and gouache, silver paint, graphite on illustration board 


(On reverse part of printed information about the manufacturer of the board:
...AMCO/....TRATION BOARD/...AN ARTISTS SUPPLY CO., INC.,/..New York
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite from lower left to lower right: LACQUER SCREEN FOR MR. G. SELDES // SIZE 7'-6 x 4 [torn] Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: LACQUER SCREEN FOR MR. G. SELDES// SIZE 7'-6 x 4 [torn]

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Gilbert Seldes Apartment: Design for the Lysistrata Lacquer Screen", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Brush and gouache, silver paint, graphite on illustration board 


(On reverse part of printed information about the manufacturer of the board:
...AMCO/....TRATION BOARD/...AN ARTISTS SUPPLY CO., INC.,/..New York. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-13.
